products.title: Day & Night Effortless Royal Blue
products.productdescription: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work.

products.title: Capri Vision Navy Day and Night Blind
products.metadescription: Capri vision navy day and night blind in blue. Made to measure from 31.24 with free uk mainland delivery. This day and night blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The capri vision navy day and night roller blind is designed in a classic navy hue and is great for adding the finishing touch to a coordinating scheme. The striped design includes navy polyester fabric panels and sheer voile panels so you can easily alter the natural light levels in your room.
 
 Product id: db-vrbx1849 fabric colour: navy material: 100% polyester headrail: aluminium tube with steel brackets   energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Bayham, Navy - Vista Blind
products.metadescription: Bayham, navy - vista blind navy blue is a classic colour that has finally received the modern twist it deserves with the arrival of bayham navy. By combining elegant voile panels with the regal nature of navy we have created a unique aesthetic that is the
products.productdescription: Navy blue is a classic colour that has finally received the modern twist it deserves with the arrival of bayham navy. By combining elegant voile panels with the regal nature of navy we have created a unique aesthetic that is the perfect blend of style and substance. With the minimum of effort you can now tailor your light levels and the style of your blind in seconds.Navy works wonders when you allow it to create a theme in the master bedroom. A soothing and reassuring colour that will have you drifting off to sleep in no time at all. Match it with your bedspread and a soft hand-tufted rug to give your room something to smile about.
